text: Wið yflum & miclum footsuilun.
Cnua beolonan moran suiðe, lege on ða foet.
Hie geðuinað & alne ðone ece wunderlice afirrað.
Eft to ðon ilcan.
Genim ðære læssan mucgwyrte moran, cnua wel, gemæng suæ calde wið hunig, ete ðæt gemong on marne & ðonne he restan welle.
Ðæs ilcan lecedom mæg wið ðeh wærce.
Gif foet oððo sconcan oððo cnio suellen, genim neodowarde beolonan oððo eolectran, gecnua suiðe wið smæng wið maelum hwæte meolwe gecneed to dage.
Clæn on ð<../images/etail.gif>t asuoln limm, wrið on næhterne.
On mærne bið se suile geðuinen sio duæning dæg ðaeh <ðe> hio on neate sie.
Wyrc god dust to rotigendum dolge, nim acrinde & slahðornes wyrtruman rinde.
Innewarde adryg wyrt to duste.
Ðæt bið god In dolg to scædenne.
Ðis dust is good to scedenne gif men foet suellen & ða tan cinen.
Ne wæt ða ðu foet, & hie sie stille ðendon ðu hine lecnige.
Wið foetadle, wyrc scoas of seles felle, do on ða foet & hiæ biað sona soel.
To ðon ilcan.
Wið lend wærce, wyrc gyrdels of seles felle, gyrd mið & he bið hal.
Wið ðehæci, wyrc drenc, nim eofordrotan walwyrt.
Do in win oððo in god waelc alo, drince on naehtnistig bollan fulle.
Wyrc him aec god bæð eapuldorn, slahðorn, aesc, cuiicbean, aac, eofordrote, æscðrote, eolone, biscopwyrt, ifign, betonica, ribbe, rædic.
Waell ðis all in wætre & ðis is god baeð wið ðehæci.
Wið aslepnum lic.
Genim neoðowardne seeog, waell in wætre, lege hatne stan in letrican on ðæt liic ðær hit aslepne sie.
Wyrc him aec gode salfe, genim ða readan netlan & hræfnes fot.
In suines smeome & scepes & in butran & scipteorwe.
Mið ða salfe ðæt lic ðær hit alepen sie.
<Aec> <swilce> is oðer god salf to ðon ilcan peopor hwitcudu.
<swegles> <eapol>, suefl cost ecid oele.
